data.actual_result: The flag icon updates but not the name, so you have a flag that doesn't match with the name
data.expected_result: Either nothing updates retroactively and does nothing else besides showing the save button, or the name of the region should update along with the flag icon
data.short_description: When someone changes the server region while you're viewing Server Settings > Overview, the flag of the region will update retroactively but not the name
data.steps_to_repro: - Open both Desktop and Android clients - On both clients, go to Server Settings > Overview - On Desktop, change the server region into something else with a different flag, and save the changes - Observe on Android - If it didn't work, press the Save button on Android and then re-click Save button on Desktop
